meanings.definition: The process of secreting milk from the mammary glands.
meanings.sent1: During her lactations, the mother cat feeds her kittens.
meanings.sent2: The lactations of cows are essential for producing dairy products.
meanings.sent3: The lactations of the goat seemed to amuse the farm visitors.
meanings.sent4: The lactations of the clouds, releasing raindrops, nourish the earth.
meanings.sent5: The lactations of the nursing dog were a heartwarming sight.

meanings.definition: The production or secretion of milk.
meanings.sent1: The lactations of the cow provide fresh milk daily.
meanings.sent2: Human lactations vary in composition based on diet.
meanings.sent3: The lactations of the dairy cow were a topic of discussion at the farm.
meanings.sent4: The lactations of the coconut, yielding coconut milk, are unique.
meanings.sent5: The lactations of the nursing mother are crucial for infant nutrition.

meanings.definition: The period during which a female mammal is producing milk for her young.
meanings.sent1: The lactations of the elephant can last for several years.
meanings.sent2: During her lactations, the lioness fiercely protects her cubs.
meanings.sent3: The lactations of the squirrel seemed to surprise the onlookers.
meanings.sent4: The lactations of the river, flowing with nutrients, sustain life.
meanings.sent5: The lactations of the nursing rabbit were a natural process.
